name: hydrogenated homopolymers and/or copolymers made of 1-hexene and/or 1-octene and/or 1-decene and/or 1-dodecene and/or 1-tetradecene (Mw: 440-12000)
Restrictions: Average molecular weight not less than 440 Da.Viscosity at 100 °C not less than 3,8 cSt (3,8 × 10-6 m2/s).
NotesCompliance: V2 There is a risk that the SML or OML could be exceeded in fatty food simulants.
